monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Destroys diamond blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.description: 1 x 500% physical damage (earth) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value, cannot be dodged

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Burrow
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Charge Amplifier
skills.description: Aura: All Charge stacks in the party are 33% stronger.

skills.name: Charged Banner
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Glory, Spellshield or Regenerate (Buffs).

skills.name: Coal Toss
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Divine Shield
skills.description: Whenever this Monster receives a Buff, it gains a Shield equal to 5% of its Maximum Health and 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Forge
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (500 + 80% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Forge Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (750 + 100% Attack) Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Full Potential
skills.description: Shield target for 25% of target's Max Health Applies Might, Sorcery, Regeneration, Sidekick, Agility & Spellshield (Buffs)

skills.name: Gigadrill
skills.description: 6 x 100% (600%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Goblin Smith
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Goblins.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroic Party
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party deals 1% increased damage for each Buff on it.

skills.name: Improved Regeneration
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) regenerates an additional 7.5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Incinerate
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Lava Rush
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Rush Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) physical damage (fire) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value if it has Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Lava Wave
skills.description: 2 x 55% (110%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lifeline
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Lifeline Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Glory (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Lifeline Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Glory (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Load Up
skills.description: Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Multi Armor Break
skills.description: Aura: Armor Break (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Glory
skills.description: Aura: Glory (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Spiky Defense
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Armor Break on the attacker.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%
